name: DOBROGNEVA
description:
"Dobrogneva" is a visual novel based on famous Russian fairy tales.

Evil Koshei kidnaps the girl on her wedding day.

Her daring groom is trying to find her.

But what if Koshei is not so evil?

Why did he kidnap the girl anyway?

And what does she think of the situation?

Play as Dobrogneva, make your choices and decide what your fate will be!

1 route - 25-35 mins
